twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 | #12 - Searching for the Seventh (Blind Playthrough)

message.body: you just gotta activate the brain
im aight, looking at M3S guide
no idea how you noticed that
Hey Woflie, gl with the secret hunting
That is indeed what Socrates once said
The weekend has been alright, done some animations and binged the witcher.
good morning, funky little greasy little ghoul fella
I recognize a meganeko song when I hear one AlienPls
he made a remix of it
do you want to know why you start there?
are there any jump sounds? i dont hear them lol
ok i thought i was going insane
you might still be going insane
picking up on some huge wolfiexe vibes in this stage
looking like some skulldude needle tbh
I like the You've Perished death screen
skull art goes hard, good thing im not him !!
noone else can do what i do
you have to admit Blue... is the superior game over text variant tho
I don't get the reference with that one
not sure why i made everyone so angry in this stage, mustve been a weird time
thats actually quite smart now that i see it
youll be happy to hear wolfie i havent confused you and nal in 6 (six) plus months
they sound literally nothing like each other
i dont understand why it happens to me skull but it has been a plague in the past
corperate needs you to tell the difference between two british people on the internet
i think its mostly because i forgot one of your names one time
and just thought "oh british player, nal!'
i always wondered when nal told me people confuse him and wolfie, who exactly he meant by people
i cant believe its you blasted
oh   dude its been me for a while
you watch british football commentary for breakfast bro how do you confuse them
because its only when i cant find french commentary
how much have you seen of this game blasted
ive stayed spoiler free but im also not good enough to play it so i dont know why
wasn't there a cn3 already or am I misremembering
i remember using wine in my high school computer lab to play cn2
this is cn2 ported to studio, rin
and the secrets and stuff are new?
it started as just a port, then it turned into making the game a little better, then it turned into the biggest fangame ever released
you could prob watch the 2.5 interviews on the awards with kale himself talking about the game
you almost already have more time in this than i did in my first full save of baldur's gate 3 lol
and yeah skull, kale's whole cn3 dev commentary series was incredible
thats not what i meant but thats also quite insightful
i JUST finished it, 46h20m was my first
you have to play more dq11 blasted..
im technically debating between dq11 or yakuza like a dragon (1st not hawaii)
act 3 will come in due time
I had super-hard monsters on and it became a bit brutal, wasn't really in the right spot to stick with it
Can't go wrong with DQ11 or the Like a Dragon games
the draconian stuff is super cool, i wanna do the one where villagers BS you
I just wasn't feeling the uh, sigma grindset? at the time
Like a Dragon 7 and 8 are much different than 0-6
did you play the turbo edition or whatever rin
that came to switch exclusively first
if it brings back one of the characters im thinking of though... i may be more convinced of playing it sooner...
oh my dryer sheets are moonlight breeze scented whaetever that means
echoes of an elusive age S: definitive edition
Definitive edition does have the 16bit mode too, basically play the game differently

yeah i also did the base edition cuz it looks better, S has more content and the 2d thing but im p sure i wouldn't do either of those things anyway, they seem to be references to other previous dq games too and id rather do those beforehand
the only mod i put in was for the orchestra music
im definitely not playing pixel mode
but ill be playing definitive cuz i got it for free on PS plus
also S has stuff like forging or camping at any time and thats just weird af to me
might as well not even be the same game at that point
I'm waiting doe the DQ3 2D-HD to come out
That square block looks so sad. It needs a hug.
my sister has been jamming dragon warrior 2
or am i SOL for being on console
i mean, you can prob select it but like its very easy to mod
i can 100% recommend the base game
ye i just said im on console bro. . .
dude my pc sucks and it ran perfectly
and i played with a dualshock
well i just dont own it on pc thats all
its 40 extra bucks i dont wanna spend lol
base game isn't on steam anyways
they replaced it with definitive edition
I've still got base game registered to my Steam because I bought it then, I've got S on my Switch
if i wanna true end should i just follow a guide or can i go in willy nilly and assume i wont miss shit
I have every version on every console.. cause lol speedrunning at the time
definitive edition looks way worse, and the things it adds feel like it takes away from things i really appreciated from the game's pacing and atmosphere, i much prefer the base game
There's nothing relevant that's missable in 11
but realistically, youd prob not give a shit and think im being a bitch
i mean its the version i already own, theres no way i was going out there and buying it again for a base version lol
nanana i got it on ps4
I like 11S, but I still miss the dumb crossbow
theres a lot that just don't make it the same comparing 11 and 11s
royal has such better pacing imo
Atlus kinda does this thing with SMT/Persona games where it rereleases the games with a lot of new stuff but make them so much easier
yeah as someone who has spent 140 dollars to play the singular game of smt 5
There are 2 completely different stories, but the added content makes it much easier to braek
People were expecting it after SMT4A anyway
yeah, but i played the base version on switch because i couldnt wait
vengeance is an enhanced port of the original with a bunch of qol stuff and some more stuff that makes it easier, as well as the new route
Yeah the new story and QoL is really good
its the only one available on pc anyway
Yeah plus original SMT5 is only Switch which is horrible to play on
vengeance got announced about 2 weeks after I finished base :)
cannot recommend smt 5 enough as a starting point to the series
tho i think 4 holds the most sentimental value for me
i didnt knew we could do bosses, otherwise i wouldve done that
nocturne also sucks from a qol perspective tho
yeah nocturne is still very old-school even on the hd remaster
i cant think of anything in these 100 floors that can mute ur vod ngl
dude there's an ice cream van guy that lives around the corner from me so I hear them constantly lmao
alright im gonna go play dq11 now, but wolfie if u ever dip into SMT let me know, ill be there
if I were the warp, where would I be
paint and subpixels, name a more iconic duo
that's such an awesome way of having a secret screen god
Ziggy7Z subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 51 months! Is this a bort and rebort situation?

long and short fuse with bombs
The marbles have been let loose
when i had my wisdom teeth out i just ate ice cream for like a week
for some fucking reason I did that with a tin of golden syrup
i dont think those exist here lol
If there were 5 it'd be a bit much
side of the screen just kills you
This seems too elaborate for it to be a hint
make the posture better than ok moleYo
hey tyste hey alex hey wowowolfie
and hey rest who hasnt said hi to me Kappa /
we do a modicum of trolling
I mean all diagonals are impossible until you get through
I've been playing Cat Quest 3 and the contrast in gaming difficulty is pretty stark.
this entrance feels like it would be Kale
this is just the kind of platforming Kale would incorporate in a secret I feel like
i think I got a bit of a feel from it from CN3
when you got to bad end there were blocks with the tilesets where you could find them
Kale does like to send you back and forth through a room for a secret
Do not pass GO, do not collect $200
after yesterday, i find it quite difficult for you to please him wolfie...
So, what was the portal? A rejump?
I do wonder at what stage in development the disapearing platforms became a uniform thing
Maybe kale will bless us with another dev commentary series
do you want to know the logic for that working
I think the easier-ness is just very gradual
and getting further seems to add a lot more score as well
Party1 i did my part o7
i remember when para played one of my first games, the vod wasnâ€™t highlighted and after watching his playthrough like 15 times i was very sad when it went away
this reminds me of one of the ratchet and clank games where there's a boss that gets easier the first 10 times you die to it
so it ends up being faster to just jump off a ledge at the start of the fight 10 times and hten do it normally
The "alright, you suck, go get em tiger" mechanic
it's more like "you have shown tremendous resolve, here's a leg up"
as a non-insulting way to do it
Do you want clippy to help?
it's basically like wrapping pills in cheese
Clippy would be a direct upgrade to the tire fire that is Co-Pilot atm
Heck I'd take Microsoft bob at this point
Might settle for the Bonzi Buddy even
if you're cold he's cold. let him in
it's crazy how now that you've gotten better the bullets seem slower than before
some days you brain, some days you brain't
at least one of them was a saber, i think
You can do it. I believe
oh wow the bullets are a lot slower now
I wish all avoidances had this. they should make this an engine
oh nononono my score was giant by the end of this
probably max's score. he tested this too so that makes sense
this is just like fate grand order
How big is this fucking game. Like file size. There's so much. Lol.
some of those dodges upside down..
me when i finish my presentation with "so uhmmm yeah"
why clannad after story (ova) is a 5/10
Cmon wolfi, gather your marbles you've got this naloasGood

Hey Sumo, didn't know you f-ed up your arm. Hope you get better soon

good stuff, take care my friend
